lead_paragraph: Brandon Webb gave up a season-high 10 hits on Monday in his shortest start since 2006, and Mark Teixeira drove in four runs to lead the host Atlanta Braves past the Arizona Diamondbacks, 7-3.
snippet: Brandon Webb gave up a season-high 10 hits on Monday in his shortest start since 2006, and Mark Teixeira drove in four runs to lead the host Atlanta Braves past the Arizona Diamondbacks, 7-3.
